roasts.name: Coffee For A Cause: S.O.S Colombia
roasts.tasting_notes: Dizzying depths of flavor, astonishing complexity all biased toward _delicious_. Rewarding of careful tasting, but so delicious it's easy to forget about being a snob and just enjoy the beverage. Taste the cherries. Taste the baking spice. Taste the chocolate. From farmer to roaster, there's incredible skill on display here. Good luck finding a better roaster than Brandywine.

roasts.name: Sumatra - Mandheling - Bukit Barisan
roasts.tasting_notes: Incredibly satisfying flawless Sumatra. Billed as their 'beginner' coffee, it nonetheless has layers of complexity and depth. Nutty delicacy over a rich, full bodied chocolate base. I'm very excited to have discovered this roaster!
